org.boon.datarepo.impl

Class FilterDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.boon.datarepo.impl.FilterDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter, FilterComposer

    public class FilterDefault
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter, FilterComposer
    This class should be renamed mother of all beasts. This class is the reason I have no hair. It implements the first cut of a decent criteria plan.
    Author:
    Rick Hightower
